name: spencers
description: Spencer's Restaurant demo website using voice agent.
author: vocal0.com

scripts.add: npm run upgrade && npm run nuke && npm run lint && npm run sort && git add .
scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist && npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.predev: cd ../vocal0/modules/client && npm run prestart && cp dist/vocal0.min.js ../../../spencers/public/vocal0.min.js
scripts.nuke: npm run clean && npm cache verify && npm install
